overview: Love triangle between Kkum (dream) and Hyeon-sil (reality) and me. Hyeon-sil (meaning reality) came to me slowly but surely, without my consent. On the other hand, Kkum (meaning dream) still feels far away from me. I wanted to talk about relationship between dream, reality and me as a familiar form of girl cartoon (shojo manga).
title: Love At The Crossroads
